extension.description:
JA Typo Button Plugin for Joomla! 2.5

Features: Please install plugin JA Typo.

Usage Instruction:
  • Upon installation of this plugin, JA Typo button can be accessed in the editor.
Upgrade Method:
  • You can install new version directly over this version. Uninstallation is not required.
  • Backup any customized files before upgrading.
